sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- ... your template code ... -->
  <b-modal v-model="modalVisible" title="Create Shoe">
    
    <b-form @submit.prevent="createShoe">
      <b-form-group label="Brand" label-for="brand">
        <b-form-input id="brand" v-model="brand" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      
      <b-form-group label="Model" label-for="model">
        <b-form-input id="model" v-model="model" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>

      <b-form-group label="Size" label-for="size">
        <b-form-input id="size" v-model="size" type="number" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>

      <b-form-group label="Color" label-for="color">
        <b-form-input id="color" v-model="color" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>

      <b-form-group label="Price" label-for="price">
        <b-form-input id="price" v-model="price" type="number" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>

      <b-form-group label="Image" label-for="image">
        <b-form-file v-model="image" accept="image/*"></b-form-file>
      </b-form-group>

      <b-button type="submit">Submit</b-button>
    </b-form>
  </b-modal>
  <!-- ... your template code ... -->
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
  // eslint-disable-next-line vue/multi-word-component-names
  name: 'Shoe',
  data() {
    return {
      modalVisible: false,
      brand: '',
      model: '',
      size: null,
      color: '',
      price: null,
      image: null, // Variable to store the selected image file
    };
  },
  methods: {
    openModal() {
      this.modalVisible = true;
    },
    closeModal() {
      this.modalVisible = false;
    },
    createShoe() {
      // Create a FormData object to send the form data
      const formData = new FormData();
      formData.append('brand', this.brand);
      formData.append('model', this.model);
      formData.append('size', this.size);
      formData.append('color', this.color);
      formData.append('price', this.price);
      formData.append('image', this.image);

      // Make a POST request to the backend endpoint
      axios.post('http://localhost:8080/create', formData)
        .then(response => {
          console.log(response.data);
          // Handle the response as needed
        })
        .catch(error => {
          console.error('Error:', error);
          // Handle errors
        })
        .finally(() => {
          // Close the modal regardless of success or failure
          this.closeModal();
        });
    },
  },
};
</script>
